00021 template<
00022 typename KeyType = string,
00023 typename ValueType = NullType,
00024 size_t ENTRY_POW = 17
00025 >class cccr_hash : public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType>
00026 {
00027         enum {ENTRY_SIZE = (2<<ENTRY_POW)};
00028         enum {ENTRY_MASK = ENTRY_SIZE-1};
00029         enum {EXPAND = PAGE_EXPANDING};
00030         typedef DataType<KeyType,ValueType> DataType;
00031 public:
00032         cccr_hash()
00033         {
00034                 for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00035                 {
00036                         entry_[i] = NULL;
00037                 }
00038                 count_ = 0;
00039         }
00040 
00041         ~cccr_hash()
00042         {
00043                 for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00044                 {
00045                         if (entry_[i]!=NULL) delete entry_[i];
00046                         entry_[i] = NULL;
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00050         bool insert(const DataType& data) {
00051                 return insert(data.get_key(), data.get_value());
00052         }
00053 
00054         bool update(const DataType& dat) {
00055                 return update(dat.get_key(), dat.get_value());
00056         }
00057 
00058         int num_items() const
00059         {
00060                 return count_;
00061         }
00062 
00063         void display(std::ostream & os=std::cout)
00064         {
00065                 for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00066                 {
00067                         char* pBkt = entry_[i];
00068 
00069                         if (pBkt ==NULL)
00070                         continue;
00071 
00072                         os<<endl<<i<<" Entry===========\n";
00073 
00074                         uint32_t bs = *(uint32_t*)(pBkt);
00075                         uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00076                         os<<"bucket size: "<<bs<<endl;
00077                         os<<"content len: "<<content_len<<endl;
00078 
00079                         uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00080                         while (p < content_len)
00081                         {
00082                                 size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00083                                 p += sizeof (size_t);
00084                                 os<<"("<<len<<")";
00085 
00086                                 for (size_t j=0; j<len; j++)
00087                                 os<<pBkt[p+j];
00088                                 p += len;
00089 
00090                                 os<<"=>"<<*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))<<endl;
00091                                 p += sizeof (uint64_t);
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& v)
00097         {
00098                 char* str;
00099                 std::size_t ksize;
00100                 //write_image(key, str, ksize); 
00101                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00102                 izs.write_image(str, ksize);
00103 
00104                 uint32_t idx = izenelib::util::sdb_hash_fun(str,ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00105 
00106                 uint64_t value = dataVec_.size();
00107                 dataVec_.push_back(v);
00108 
00109                 char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00110 
00111                 if (pBkt == NULL)
00112                 {
00113                         entry_[idx] = pBkt = new char[INIT_BUCKET_SIZE];
00114                         *(uint32_t*)(pBkt) = 64;
00115                         *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1) = 2*sizeof(uint32_t);
00116                 }
00117                 else
00118                 {//does it exist?
00119                         uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1);
00120                         uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00121                         while (p < content_len)
00122                         {
00123                                 size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00124 
00125                                 if (len != ksize )
00126                                 {
00127                                         p += sizeof (size_t) + len + sizeof(uint64_t);
00128                                         continue;
00129                                 }
00130 
00131                                 p += sizeof (size_t);
00132 
00133                                 size_t j=0;
00134                                 for (; j<len; j++)
00135                                 if (str[j] != pBkt[p+j])
00136                                 break;
00137 
00138                                 if (j == len)
00139                                 {
00140                                         //*(uint64_t*)(pBkt+p+j) = value;
00141                                         return false;
00142                                 }
00143 
00144                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147 
00148                 uint32_t bs = *(uint32_t*)(pBkt);
00149                 uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1);
00150 
00151                 if (bs-content_len<ksize+sizeof(size_t)+sizeof(uint64_t))
00152                 {
00153                         bs += EXPAND ==PAGE_EXPANDING? INIT_BUCKET_SIZE: ksize+sizeof(size_t)+sizeof(uint64_t);
00154                         //content_len += str.length()+sizeof(uint32_t);
00155                         pBkt = new char[bs];
00156                         memcpy(pBkt, entry_[idx], *(uint32_t*)(entry_[idx]) );
00157                         delete entry_[idx];
00158                         entry_[idx] = pBkt;
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 *((size_t*)(pBkt+content_len)) = ksize;
00162                 content_len += sizeof(size_t);
00163                 memcpy(pBkt+content_len, str, ksize);
00164                 content_len += ksize;
00165                 *((uint64_t*)(pBkt+content_len)) = value;
00166                 content_len += sizeof(uint64_t);
00167 
00168                 *(uint32_t*)(pBkt) = bs;
00169                 *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1) = content_len;
00170 
00171                 count_++;
00172                 return true;
00173                 //LDBG_<<str;
00174 
00175         }
00176 
00177         ValueType* find(const KeyType& key)
00178         {
00179                 char* str;
00180                 size_t ksize;
00181                 //write_image(key, str, ksize);
00182                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00183                 izs.write_image(str, ksize);
00184 
00185                 uint32_t idx = izenelib::util::sdb_hash_fun(str,ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00186 
00187                 char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00188                 if (pBkt == NULL)
00189                 return NULL;
00190 
00191                 uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00192 
00193                 uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00194                 while (p < content_len)
00195                 {
00196                         size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00197                         p += sizeof (size_t);
00198                         if (ksize != len)
00199                         {
00200                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00201                                 continue;
00202                         }
00203 
00204                         size_t i = 0;
00205                         for (; i<len; i++)
00206                         {
00207                                 if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00208                                 break;
00209                         }
00210                         if (i != len)
00211                         {
00212                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00213                                 continue;
00214                         }
00215 
00216                         p += len;
00217 
00218                         if (*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))!=(uint64_t)-1)
00219                         return &(dataVec_[*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))]);
00220                         else
00221                         return NULL;
00222 
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 return NULL;
00226 
00227         }
00228 
00229         bool del(const KeyType& key)
00230         {
00231 
00232                 char* str;
00233                 size_t ksize;
00234                 //write_image(key, str, ksize);
00235                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00236                 izs.write_image(str, ksize);
00237 
00238                 uint32_t idx = izenelib::util::sdb_hash_fun(str,ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00239 
00240                 char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00241                 if (pBkt ==NULL)
00242                 return -1;
00243 
00244                 uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00245 
00246                 uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00247                 while (p < content_len)
00248                 {
00249                         size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00250                         p += sizeof (size_t);
00251                         if (ksize != len)
00252                         {
00253                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00254                                 continue;
00255                         }
00256 
00257                         size_t i = 0;
00258                         for (; i<len; i++)
00259                         {
00260                                 if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00261                                 break;
00262                         }
00263                         if (i != len)
00264                         {
00265                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00266                                 continue;
00267                         }
00268 
00269                         p += len;
00270 
00271                         *((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p)) = (uint64_t)-1;
00272 
00273                         count_ --;
00274                         return true;
00275                 }
00276 
00277                 return false;
00278         }

00280         bool update(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& v)
00281         {
00282 
00283                 char* str;
00284                 size_t ksize;
00285                 //write_image(key, str, ksize);
00286                 izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);
00287                 izs.write_image(str, ksize);
00288 
00289                 uint32_t idx = izenelib::util::sdb_hash_fun(str,ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00290 
00291                 char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00292 
00293                 if (pBkt ==NULL)
00294                 return -1;
00295 
00296                 uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00297 
00298                 uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00299                 while (p < content_len)
00300                 {
00301                         size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00302                         p += sizeof (size_t);
00303                         if (ksize != len)
00304                         {
00305                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00306                                 continue;
00307                         }
00308 
00309                         size_t i = 0;
00310 
00311                         for (; i<len; i++)
00312                         {
00313                                 if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00314                                 break;
00315                         }
00316                         if (i != len)
00317                         {
00318                                 p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00319                                 continue;
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         p += len;
00323 
00324                         if (*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p)) != (uint64_t)-1)
00325                         {
00326                                 dataVec_[*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))] = v;
00327                                 return true;
00328                         }
00329                         else
00330                         return false;
00331                 }
00332 
00333                 return false;
00334         }
